description: The OR_LOG_ALL_STAFF table contains information about all staff members associated with a procedural case that has been performed. This includes physicians, procedural staff, anesthesia staff, pre-op nurses, and recovery nurses.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the procedural log record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STAFF_TYPE_MAP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The staff type mapping category ID for the staff member.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Physician


Anesthesia Provider


Other Anesthesia Staff


Preprocedure Nurse


Recovery Nurse


Phase II Nurse


General Staff


Circulator


Scrub Nurse


Surgical Tech

columns.name: STAFF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider record that represents the staff member.

columns.name: ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The role category ID for the staff member. This will only have a value for physicians.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Primary

columns.name: SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The service category ID for the staff member. This will only have a value for physicians.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PANEL
columns.description: The panel number for the staff member. This will only have a value for physicians.

columns.name: STAFF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The staff type category ID for the staff member. This will only have a value for procedural staff.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anesthesia staff type category ID for the staff member. This will only have a value for anesthesia staff.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCOUNTBLE_STAFF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the staff member is considered primary or responsible for the log record represented by this row. Y indicates that the staff member is considered primary for procedural staff or responsible for anesthesia providers. N indicates that the staff member is not considered primary or responsible. For physicians, it is only the primary physician on the first panel.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TIME_DURATION_MINS
columns.description: The length of time the staff member is documented as either in room or responsible in minutes for the log represented by this row.
